@chris5marsh @csswizardry @Documentally Try to get a good night's sleep but also try to have at least one end-to-end run through while standing (not sitting in front of your laptop). Don't be afraid to look out at the audience as you get comfortable, and most of all enjoy yourself. It will be ace!
